title: fried fish bites with homemade ketchup and fennel salad
description: A treat of deep-fried fish and prawns, flavour-packed homemade ketchup and a fresh, crunchy radish and fennel salad.
ingredients: 200g/7oz cod fillet, skinned, cut into pieces
200g/7oz smoked haddock, skinned, cut into pieces
200g/7oz tiger prawns, tails on and shelled
1 head fennel, thinly sliced lengthways on a mandoline
